body_html: Above references are just examples or projects you can learn from when designating the new DSL for tensorflow. You can just borrow the good parts from each if they are relevant in designing the new DSL. There need to be one through out DSL which is close to DAG / Dataflow concepts and which can represent among other ML algorithms.
